General.Description: Although Nxt is considered as a 2nd generation crypto currency, NXT has all the features like other brothers. Moreover, Nxt was designed with more features such as hashing mechanism, time between blocks, starting difficulty, etc and brought with all the alt coins. Nxt gives users the available creation and exchanging of custom tokens, and asseting on the Blockchain. The PoS model made the transactions easier and support large transaction volumes, which has the same as the traditional Bitcoin and its clones have as a potential flaw.
General.Features: There are many efficient features that NXT providing to the users such as decentralized exchange, huge data storage system, decentralized Autonomous Organisations. Moreover, the Voting System, Account control and the Fraud resistant will be the competitive advantages compare to other brother coins.
General.Technology: The NXT has been built with a novel hybrid Proof-of-Work (PoW) and Proof-of-Stake (PoS) algorithm like the other coins, but it makes the differences in Conditional Trustless transactions and the impressive data storage system.
